original_title: Die Heiden von Kummerow und ihre lustigen Streiche
overview: Kummerow, a village in North East Germany, around 1900: Mean-spirited miller DÃ¼ker wants to drive cowherd Krischan out of the village. Being popular with the local children, Krischan can rely on the help of schoolboys Martin and Johannes and their friends, who try to prevent the miller's plans by playing pranks on him.
title: The Heathens of Kummerow
